document_data.name: Horizikaul's Boom
document_data.mainbody: '''''Horizikaul's boom''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell bombarded a targeted creature with an incredibly loud high-pitched sonic attack. It could strike a moving target. The targeted creature suffered from sonic damage and was temporarily deafened. If the targeted creature was within an area of effect of a ''[[silence]]'' spell, the spell had no effect.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
